data.title: 100% clean energy. Now
data.meta_description: Learn about our 100% renewable energy generation, and find the latest energy plans at competitive prices from Pacific Blue.
data.text:
Not in 2050, now.

At Pacific Blue, our generation business has been about 100% clean energy for over 30 years. We generate energy from only the wind, solar, and hydro right across Australia. So, to us, clean energy isn’t a promise for 2050, it’s already here now.

While you can’t choose where the energy in your house comes from, you can choose who to support. When you sign up to one of our retail energy plans, you’re creating demand that enables our generation arm to invest in more renewable energy projects right here in Australia.

So why wait until 2050, when you can get behind an energy company who’s making a difference now. The wait for clean energy is over.

Learn more

100% carbon neutral energy plans

Sign up to our 100% carbon neutral plans, where all the energy supplied to your home is 100% carbon offset. At no additional cost to you, we ensure that you can neutralise your impact on the planet, starting now.

View plans

Powering the AO with 100% clean energy

As the Official Renewable Energy Partner of the Australian Open, we’re proud to be powering the AO with 100% renewable energy, making it one of the first major sporting events in Australia to mitigate its electricity usage.

Congratulations to the five lucky winners of our free electricity offer for one year!

Learn more

At our core, we are community focused

An Australian first, Pacific Blue developed a Community Benefits Sharing Program that supports local communities and environments where our generation sites are located, and has provided over $5 million to communities.

Learn more
